body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Billy Cooper and the customer's name is Gloria Walker.  The conversation is about Happy Animal Shelter (a Animal Shelter ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling ABC Solutions. My name is Alex. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alex, I'm having some issues with my account. Can you help me with that?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, I'd be happy to help. Can I start by getting your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is John Doe.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. For security purposes, can you please provide me with the last four digits of your Social Security Number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The last four digits are one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Can you also provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My date of birth is January first, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. I have verified your information. How can I assist you further with your account today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I need to update my email address.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can help with that. Please provide me with your new email address.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The new email address is johndoe@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect. I have updated your email address to johndoe@example.com. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for today. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. Thank you for your time. Have a great day!
